name: sojourn
content:

a short period when a person stays in a particular place: My sojourn in the youth hostel was thankfully short. After a brief sojourn in Holland to study Sanskrit, he moved to India. Synonyms
stay (VISIT)
visit
More examplesFewer examplesWe had been planning this little sojourn for several months.He took his annual summer sojourn with his cousin Catherine.The painting is one that the artist completed in Los Angeles during a six-month sojourn here in 1932.
